entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:32 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 07:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 20.9 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: S 40 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wet snow over higher terrain early this morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:22 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 07:22 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
